ai-patthana23.46:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.46:0.3_0: Seeing that in oneself is the truth of nature, they will see
ai-patthana23.46:1.1_0: One should not give up resentment for seeing in order to give up repulsion and not seeing; for this is a condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana23.46:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.46:2.1_0: One should not give up repulsion regarding development, because of the path to developing, because of not-self in development, because of the path and to practice the rest of the Path.
ai-patthana23.46:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.46:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give up resentment to someone without seeing the cause of resistance. You should give up tendencies.
